course_title: Topics in Geography - TOPICS IN GEOG

sections.comments: "Critical Geographies of Transport and Mobility" explores multiple dimensions of human movement, particularly with a critical social science lens.  The course will focus on topics such as mobility justice (including accessibility and immobility), grassroots walking and cycling infrastructures, and the impact of embodied commute experiences on mode choice and practice.  We will also make a visit to the City of Vancouver's Streets and Transportation office.This online seminar has a synchronous scheduled meeting time.

description: See the departmental undergraduate advisor for details.
